About Me

BIO

Hi, welcome to my profile! Allow me to give you a brief overview of myself. I've always had a creative ability and a fascination for how things work. I'm passionate about electronics and new technologies. Thanks to various internships during my engineering studies, I've had the opportunity to develop skills in:

  • IA & IOT
  • WEB & MOBILE
  • EMBEDDED SYSTEM

    • IA & IOT

    Expertise in exploiting new technologies such as IoT, AI and machine learning

    WEB & MOBILE

    Expertise in exploiting new technologies such as WEB and MOBILE solutions

    EMBEDDED SYSTEM

    Design, validation and development of electronic circuits using high-level languages.
